comments.comment_text: The `mermaid_theme` for the `academic` theme is set to `default`, which is the same as the global `rendering.mermaid_theme` defined on line 32. This is redundant. To improve maintainability and avoid potential inconsistencies if the global default is changed in the future, it's better to remove this theme-specific override. The application should fall back to the global `mermaid_theme` for the `academic` theme when this override is not present.
comments.recommendation: Remove the redundant mermaid_theme: default entry from the academic theme configuration
comments.reasoning: DRY principle - configuration values should not be duplicated; prevents maintenance burden and future inconsistencies

fix_details.result: Academic theme now inherits global mermaid_theme: default value (line 32)
